item.title: Hot Cup O'Monkey add a quote by E.F. Benson
item.description: "With regard to religion, finally, it may be briefly said that she believed in God in much the same way as she believed in Australia. For she had no doubts whatever as to the existence of either; ad she went to church on Sunday in much the same spirit as she would look at a kangaroo in the zoological gardens; for kangaroos came from Australia." -- E.F. Benson

item.title: Hot Cup O'Monkey add a quote by Nick Trout
item.description: "...hoping that he might peek through a gap in the fance and see that Patch was really a big softy, all bark and no bite, or, as they sometimes say in England, "All mouth and no trousers"!" -- Nick Trout
